text: Læa mi penkar bangkhwr kæ mnusʹy khn dı thi ca hı xallxhˌ tras kæ khea wentæ doy thang wa hiyˌ hrux doy thang beuxnghlang man hrux doythi phraxngkh ca sng thut ma læw khea (ma lak) k ca na wa hiyˌ ma tam thi phraxngkh thrng prasngkh doy baycha khxng phraxngkh thæcring phraxngkh pen phuthrng sungsng phuthrng pricha yan
